metadata.name: Dawn Of Existence
metadata.description:
A study on sentience and existence.

Mixed digital media, 2022, by mendezmendez.  
Genesis drop in the Singular 1/1 collection.

AUCTION MECHANICS  
Each bidder on the auction will receive a unique 1/1 artwork as a gesture of gratitude for their bid. The Fragments are a companion collection of derivatives handcrafted one by one. 

Each drop in the Singular collection will feature a completely different set of Fragments, as rewards to the bidders. 

One Fragment 1/1 reward per wallet.
